sentences.en: A good example a university job like a teaching or research asistanshipresearch assistantship.
sentences.cn: 在大学任助教或助理研究员就是个不错的例子.

sentences.en: A good example a university job like a teaching or research assistantship.
sentences.cn: 助教或者助理研究员就是很好的例子.

sentences.en: A good example is a university job like a teaching or assistantship.
sentences.cn: 好的例子比如助教或者是助教奖学金.

sentences.en: A good example is a university job like a teaching or research assistantship, some assistantship.
sentences.cn: 像大学里面的助教或是研究助手是个很好的例子.

sentences.en: A good example is an a university job like teching a teaching or research assistantresearch assistantship.
sentences.cn: 很好的例子就是大学的工作比如教书或是研究生助教奖学金.

sentences.en: A good example is University a university job like a teaching or research aship research assistantship.
sentences.cn: 比较好的工作是大学里的工作例如教书或者研究助理.

sentences.en: An assistantship at university is a job that is paid with money or free classes.
sentences.cn: 大学中助教奖学金支付现金或免费课程.

sentences.en: Do you think they'll consider my application for an assistantship?
sentences.cn: 你认为他们会考虑我的研究生助教奖学金的申请 吗 ?

sentences.en: If you can do this, you are almost guaranteed an assistantship.
sentences.cn: 如果你能做到这些, 就几乎能保证得到资助了.

sentences.en: Later, after I improve my English, I will try to obtain a teaching assistantship.
sentences.cn: 之后, 等我提高了英语水平, 我就会努力争取获得一份助教奖学金.

sentences.en: Q: Have you got any scholarship or assistantship in this university?
sentences.cn: 问: 你得到过奖学金或助学金 吗 ?
减免学费 、 奖学金和助学金等.
